name: i.Game 中国麻将 Lite
description:
i.Game中国麻将

本游戏玩法及计分方式乃遵照中国之国标麻将规则。游戏中特别提供休闲模式及擂台模式两种不同玩法,开战时亦可选择打花与否,以及是否8番起和,以增加休闲与挑战的不同乐趣。

擂台模式共有五个等级16位个性不同的对手,你必须将他们一一打败,取得最后的麻将王头衔。

专为 iPhone设计的操作接口,可动态放大点选的牌,方便打牌,亦可滑牌打出,更可局部放画面任何位置,可随时继续未完成的牌局,金榜记录中贴心记录最大番数和牌组和,以及81个番种达成次数,还有许多好玩的小创意,让您爱不释手,是拥有 iPhone的你必备的游戏。

i.Game China Mahjong

The traditional Mahjong game, according to Chinese Official International Rules. There are 81 scoring hands in China Mahjong, score ranging from 1 to 88 points for each scoring hand. Players can choose to play the standard competition rule of 8 points minimum for winning or no minumum at all. In the 8-points minumum game, all players will be deducted 8 points even if they are not the player which discarded the winning tile, thus making the game more thrilling!

i.Game China Mahjong provides two game modes, Leisure mode for practice and Challenge mode with 16 opponents of 5 skill levels and different personalities, which you have to defeat to get the Mahjong Champion Award.

Specially designed for iPhone, easy to play user interface. Just touch to magnify and flick to discard tiles! Rankboard will also keep the tile combination of the highest winning hand.
